children.textContent: Test: Overflow Behavior

Overflow: visible (default)
            
                
                    This content is larger than its container and will overflow visibly outside the bounds.
                
            
        
        
        
            Overflow: hidden
            
                
                    This content is larger than its container but will be clipped and hidden.
                
            
        
        
        
            Overflow: scroll
            
                
                    This content is larger than its container and will have scrollbars (always visible).
                
            
        
        
        
            Overflow: auto
            
                
                    This content is larger than its container and will have scrollbars only when needed.
                
            
        
        
        
            Axis-specific overflow
            
                
                    Horizontal scroll only - vertical content is clipped.
                
            
            
                
                    Vertical scroll only - horizontal content is clipped.
                
            
        
        
        
            Text overflow behavior
            
                This is a very long text that will be truncated with ellipsis
            
            
                This is a very long text that will be clipped without ellipsis
            
        
        
        
            No overflow (content fits)
            
                
                    This content fits nicely within its container bounds.
                
            
        
    
    
    
    
    {
        "test_id": "box_012_overflow",
        "category": "advanced",
        "features": ["overflow", "overflow-visible", "overflow-hidden", "overflow-scroll", "overflow-auto", "overflow-x", "overflow-y", "text-overflow", "ellipsis", "clip"],
        "description": "Overflow property behavior with various values and axis-specific controls",
        "spec_references": ["https://www.w3.org/TR/CSS22/visufx.html#overflow"],
        "complexity": "intermediate"
    }
